Trying to escape bordom What was the last thing you did? mmm had a b'day party 4 my big'D! What is right next to you? A closet If you were a toy, what would you be? A My little Pony Where do you want to go on your honeymoon? An exotic island Who do you want to spend the rest of your life with? Jody! How many people do you have on your buddy list? 197 How's the weather right now? It's nighttime. Last person you spoke to on the phone? mmm my mom? Last person who IMed you? James Last person you IMed? James What's your ring tone? Toxic What do you think a toblerone is? Swiss candy duh! haha anna... lol hair? In a clip What are you wearing right now? Black pants, pink shirt... Do you wear contacts? Nope What school do you attend? NCCS Do you own a vehicle? yes'm Have you ever won a special award? haha... well this year, most improved for swimming and 3 letter award What are your futures plans? Go to UGA and be a Pediatric P.A. or Psychiatrist Fave day of the year? This year... SEPT 4!!! but i dunno... e'ry year is differant Are you too shy to ask anyone out? haha no... but i dont have to worry bout that now do i? ;) Have you ever been in love? Yes, deeply. Do you like scary or happy movies?? Happy most of the time Christmas or Easter? Christmas. Lust or love? Love. Kisses or hugs? Kissies. If you could change one thing, what would it be? I would change the minds of nonbelievers (of Jesus) What color are your pajamas? dadgum, i have LOTS of pajamas... so well... e'ry color! What color is your toothbrush? Blue. Fave part of the opposite sex? hair Whatâ€™s the first thing you think of when you wake up? Wut i g2 get up and do... Roller coaster: scary or exciting? Exciting! How many times do you let the phone ring before you answer it? depends how long it takes me to find it! If you could meet one person, dead or alive, who would it be? My man, JC! Fave quote? Wow... so many... i guess ill go with, "I guess i just feel sorry for you cuz u didnt know you were going against... A SUPERSTAR!~!~!~!" tee hee Zodiac sign? Virgo? Half empty or half full? Half-full Whatâ€™s your fave number? 7!~! Root beer or Doctor Pepper? Dr. Pepper i suppose? Mud or jelly wrestling? Hmmm im quite partial to mud Skiing or snowboarding? Skiing, only cuz i can... havent tried snow boarding yet... Day or night? Day... well... night too... hmmm... it all depends... i love summer nights! :):):) Summer or winter? SUMMER!!! Silver or gold? Silver. Diamonds or pearls? Diamonds are a girls best friend!~! (haha whoever said that odviously never met cameron! lol) but yes i do like diamonds. Sunrise or sunset? Sunset :) Have you ever broken a bone? Yeah... wrist Do you hate anyone? Nope... man that was a bad one to end on!

HEY THUR how is e'ryonez summa goin??? GOOD! haha well yes... the past couple days have been quite eventful... Yesterday i went to 6 flags wit cameron and anna! It was super super fun! Man the FUNNIEST things ALWAYS happen to us!!! haha... man... we saw lil bow wow thur... being attacked by random screaming crazed girls! haha. Now THERE is something worth seeing! So yeah... then that night at like 10:30 i went ova to Jody's church for a lock in! It was AWESOME!!! haha man i've never laughed so hard over the randomest things. lol... bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiggggggggggggggggg BOOTY BIG BOOTY BIG BOOTY, AHHHHHHHHHHH BIG BOOTY!!! haha... Wooow. Good times good times. So yeah, needless to say i didnt sleep... and NO jody, i WASNT tired! haha. As a matter a fact, when i got home i was really really hyper, so i went with my dad to work on his houses that he bought... man we cleaned that thing ALL DAY!!! ahhh... and finally yes, i admit it, when i got home i CRASHED! Geeze i didnt know my dad was a slavedriver! haha. Naw, it really was fun actually! So... then cameron woke me up, showed me Flipper... her new car... (i named it! tee hee) and we sat in it for quite some time! haha. Aaaaand now im here... yippie. Ehh... i'll prolly do a survey now... ;) lolol

1. My name: Cameron Alyse Mclendon 2. Where/When did we meet?: MATH CLASS in 8th grade baby!~! 3. Take a stab at my middle name.: Uh..lemme "guess"... Alyse! 4. How long have you known me?: almost 3 yrs 5. How well do you know me?: VERY VERY VERY well! to say the least! 6. Would we be classified friends or acquientances?: haha BEST FRIENDS! 7. Do I believe in God?: yeah! 8. When you first saw/met me what was your impression?: Wow... shes a wierd one! 9. My age?: 16! 10. Birthday?: December 9!~! 11. Color hair?: Red Head! haha 12. Color eyes?: Yella 13. Am I tall or short or average? AVERAGE! haha 14. Do I have any siblings?: YES! katie n kyle 15. (If opposite sex) Have you ever had a crush on me?: OF COURSE! haha (If same sex) Have you ever been jealous of me? naw... well mabye of ur parents... remember? lol 16. Who am I in love with?: ME!!! Oh... and Adam Eugene 17. What's one of my favorite things to do?: laugh uncontrollably with me! haha 18. Do you remember one of the 1st things I said to you?: Mmm i dunno... all i remember is our first phone conversasion... you sang veggie tales... THE WHOLE TIME! 19. What's your funniest memory of me?: Omigosh... TOOOOO many to count!!! 20. What's my favorite type of music?: mmm purdy much everythang 21. What is the best feature about me?: your smile 22. What is my worst feature?: ur calousy feet 23. Do you look up or down on me...as a person?: i look eye level. 24. Do you think I have morals and values?: ummm yeah! 25. Am I a leader or a follower?: prolly leader 26. Am I shy or outgoing?: outgoing! 27. Can you picture me dancin'?: haha OOOOOOO yeah baby! 28. Can you picture me rollin'?: mmm yeah? haha 29. Would you say I am funny?: yes! 30. Am I a rebel or do I follow all the rules?: We're rebels baby!~! haha lunch... good times good times! 31. Any special talents?: yes yes yes 32. What's my best accomplishment?: mmm hard to say... choosing me as a friend? haha naw... ummm just where ya r spiritually is a big accomplishment. 33. Would you consider me a friend?: OF COURSE... man these are dum Qs! 34. Would you call me preppy, sexy, a raver, a homie, average, sporty, punk, hippie, glam, nerdy, jappy, sk8er or something else?: sexy, average (haha only cuz adam sed it) Gorgeous and ummm yippy! 35. Have you ever seen me cry and visversa?: yes and yes 36. If there were one good nickname for me what would it be?: FLOOZIE!~! 37. What is your favorite thing to do with me?: MAKE MUffinS and cuddle! 38. Do I drink? hahahahhahahahhaaha 39. Do I do drugs? ye-- i mean no 40. Have I ever been there for you?: YES! 41. Am I fun to be with?: YES! 42. Am I smart?: Yeah, when ya wanna be! 43. Am I conservative or unconservative?: as conservative as you can! haha 44. Do you love me?: YES! 45. Would ya ever go out with me?(if you are of the same sex I would definitely prefer you not to answer questions 45-47!) haha fine fine... 46. Would you ever make out with me? ADAM wood! 47. Would I make a good b/f or g/f?: for ADAM... 48. Name one way that I have changed your life or made an impact in it: Man, how have u not? Your the bestest friend i could EVER ask for! You've changed my life flooz! 49. What is something about me I don't know?: haha NOTHING 50. What is something about me that few other people know? that you were born with 3 extra toes!~! hahaha

Yay!~! I'm finally NOT bored! haha yehaw! Well prolly cuz i've been with cameron for the past four days straight! haha. Yeah... scrabble i must say, is addicting! haha so addicting that we've stayed up for two days straight playing it! haha. Well, other stuff too... but hot dang! we just werent tired!~! And we're still going... on no sleep whatsoever. But yeah, fun stuff. So yeah... get ready cuz were about to go crazy with the pictures again!~! Muahaha!~!

Schools out... im bored. haha. hey if u guys knwo of anythang that i can do... leave a comment. lol. So yeah... today i went to the awards thang with cameron. It was boring. haha. Me n cameron just commented on the whole thing. haha it was funny. O- that was after getting yelled at for not wearing chapel dress (who knew???) and being 12 minutes late... i mean comon... who is actually on time the last day of school? haha. o well. its ova so w/e. Then me, cameron, jody, and his beautiful family all went to Wa-ho! haha. fun stuff... then we left and me and cameron went Garage saling!~! woo hoo!~! haha. it was really fun! we got scabble and when we got home we played ebonic scrabble. haha best kind baby!~! Who knew "leanstix" and "debluetwig" were actually words!!! haha. Man were entertained extremely easily! lol. So yeah... now im sittin here letting my inner blackness out with Christian rap. haha. Yes yes. Allllllllrighty, i think ill go make somthing up thats fun to do...

Ok so yeah... YAY FOR SUMMER! haha Well... yay for summer... for ME at least!~! Crazy! Im a Junior!~! Hmmm... not much diff... but hey... were not sophomoric... (haha Taylor Darden) lol. Woooow. So yeah... thats why im bored. Hmmm dang... im really really tired tho. i think it was a mix of that crazy math test and runnig around for a few hours with 5 pounds of quarters in my pants... haha... either way, im beat. haha. Yeah... needless to say, today was wierd... randomest stuff happend to cameron and i. haha. Our achoholic waiter, CAKE, UPS man, random guys taking pictures of us, lots of money in my pants... haha which is (by the way) a really good idea when ur bored! haha... drive around and pay for everything in change! haha. good times good times.
